attributes.additional_details:
Why do asylum seekers have preferential treatment to housing when our severely disables service people, who risk their lives for us, have to live in totally inadequate accomodation.
Disabled soldier lives on sixth floor of tower block while asylum seekers get 1Million pound house??
Our forces should have priority.

rejection.details: See e-petition titled "Injured UK soldiers returning from war to be given priority over asylum seekers and non-British nationals for housing and financial assistance"
